title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, no action is performed.
EB: Clicking on 'Add Javadoc' for a field in the Type Hierarchy view should open the Javadoc editor for that field.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
3. Attempt to add Javadoc on the selected field.
